concept.title: Viewing Directories
concept.shortdesc: You can view the directories that the uses. You might check the directories being used to access a file in the directory or to increase the amount of available space for a directory.

conbody.p: To view directories, click Administration SDC Directories .

The following table describes the directories that display:
Directory Includes Default Location
Configuration Directory The properties file (sdc.properties), and related help realm properties files and keystore files.
Also includes the logj4 properties file. <SDCinstalldir>/etc
Data Directory Pipeline configuration and run details. <SDCinstalldir>/data
Log Directory
log file, sdc.log. <SDCinstalldir>/log
Run Time Directory Base directory for executables and related files. <SDCinstalldir>
Static Web Directory User-interface related files. Are we going to display this or hide for non-dev folks? <SDCinstalldir>/sdc-static-web
